level.heading: Earned income.
level.text: Earned income includes income or resources in cash or in kind earned by an individual through the receipt of wages, salaries, commissions, or profit from activities in which he or she is self-employed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 4-201.01.
